Chimera.Special: The dragon head is either black, blue, green, red, or white (and the breath weapon with the same) effecting a cone a 50' long cone with a 10' wide end for 3d6 points of damage (save vs. Dragon Breath for half damage).

Amber Golem*.Special: Detect invisible creatures or objects within 60', and can track with 95% accuracy through any terrain type. Immune to electrical attacks which heal 1 point per 3 points of damage it would have done.

Bone Golem*.Special: 1% chance of going beserk each round cumulative - maker can try to regain control if within 60' (save versus spells each round spent doing so).

Bronze Golem*.Special: 1% chance of going beserk each round cumulative. Attackers who are hit take +1d10 fire damage and those who hit it are splashed for 2d6 fire (save vs. death ray to avoid).

Clay Golem*.Special: 1% chance per round cumulative of going berserk. Damage it inflicts can only be healed magically (1 point per die of healing.)

Flesh Golem*.Special: 1% chance per round cumulative of going berserk. Damage it inflicts can only be healed magically (1 point per die of healing.)

Iron Golem*.Special: Up to 3 times per day can emit poison gas 10' cube (save versus dragon breath or die.) Electricity slows 3 rounds and fire removes slow and heals 1 point per 3 points of damage it is rated for.

Stone Golem*.Special: Can use slow once every other round for 10' range and 2d6 duration if affected. Stone to flesh spells make them vulnerable to normal weapons for 1 round after being affected if they fail a save vs. Spells.

Wood Golem*.Special: Take +1 point damage per die and -2 to saves versus fire; suffer a -1 to initiative.

Iron Living Statue.Special: Non-magic metals can stick in until killed (save versus Spells to avoid).

Stone Living Statue.Special: Attacks by spraying molten rock to 5' range.

Black Dragon.Special: Immune to all forms of acid. may hold its breath up to three turns while lying in wait underwater.

Blue Dragon.Special: Immune to normal lightning. Suffer only half damage from magical lightning.

Gold Dragon.Special: Immune to all poisons and normal fire. Suffer half damage from magical fire.

Red Dragon.Special: Immune to normal fire. Suffer half damage from magical fire.

Sea Dragon.Special: May hold its breath up to three turns while swimming or performing other moderate activity.

White Dragon.Special: Immune to normal cold. Take half damage from magical cold or ice.

Air Elemental*.Special: Double damage from earth based attacks. +1d8 points of damage against airborne creatures or vehicles. May make 1 attack or a gust against all opponents in a 5' radius: creatures of 2 hit dice or less must save vs. Death Ray or fall prone. Creatures of 3 or more levels or hit dice are not affected.

Earth Elemental*.Special: Suffer  double  damage from fire attacks; do an +1d8 damage against creatures, vehicles, or structures which rest on the ground.

Fire Elemental*.Special: Take double damage from water attacks; +1d8 points of damage against creatures which are cold or icy in nature and set fire to flammables they contact.

Water Elemental*.Special: Take double damage when attacked from air/wind attacks. A water; +1d8 points of damage againstvcreatures, vehicles, or structures which are in the water.

Dryad.Special: Will use a charm person-like magic to try to gain control of the attacker(s), picking the most useful ones of a group.

Cloud Giant.Special: Throwing large stones to 200' for 3d6 damage

Minotaur.Special: They never become lost, and can track enemies with 85% accuracy.

Minotaur armored.Special: They never become lost, and can track enemies with 85% accuracy.

Urgoblin unarmored.Treasure: Q, R, S each; special in lair

Giant Bombardier Beetle.Special: A hot & toxic blast to the rear causes 2d6 points of damage to all within a cone 10' long and 10' wide at the far end (half damage with save vs. Death Ray).

Giant Cave Locust.Special: Can spit up to 10' away against Armor Class 11 (+ Dexterity and magical bonuses, but no normal armor value). A stricken victim must save vs. Poison or be unable incapacitated 3d6 rounds due to a horrible smell.

Insect Swarm 2 HD.Special: Unaffected by magical or normal weapons; harmed/driven off mainly by fire, sleep, smoke.

Insect Swarm 3 HD.Special: Unaffected by magical or normal weapons; harmed/driven off mainly by fire, sleep, smoke.

Insect Swarm 4 HD.Special: Unaffected by magical or normal weapons; harmed/driven off mainly by fire, sleep, smoke.

Insect Swarm.Special: Unaffected by magical or normal weapons; harmed/driven off mainly by fire, sleep, smoke.

Assassin Vine.Special: When it hits it does 1d8 points of damage, an additional 1d8 points of damage per round automatically thereafter. The victim must save vs. Death Ray with Strength bonus to break free or fight.

Green Slime*.Special: Turns victims to  slime in 6+1d4 rounds.

Ochre Jelly*.Special: Only hit by fire or cold.

Rot Grub.Special: Will burrow to the heart in 1d3 turns unless cut out/burned out (2d6 damage) first round - cure disease only save after that.

Shrieker.Special: Screams for 1d3 rounds if attacked or approached too close (10') attracting wandering monsters, nearby monsters, etc.

Yellow Mold.Special: Each patch can emit a cloud of spores once per day. All within 10 feet of the mold will be affected by the spores and  must  save  vs.  Death  Ray  or  take  1d8  points  of damage per round for 6 rounds.

Ghost.Special: Cause fear; drains 1 point constitution in additon to damage with hit; telekinesis; posession (magic jar).

Mummy*.Special: ½ damage from magic weapons; 2x damage from fires. Inflicts mummy rot disease on those it injures.

Skeleton.Special: ½ damage from edged attacks; 1 point from missiles

Zombie.Special: ½ damage from blunt attacks; 1 point from missiles
